Este post foi escrito por .... ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) rladies_theme <- theme_minimal(base_size = 15) + theme(panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), panel.grid.major = element_blank(), plot.title.position = "plot", plot.title = element_text(color = "#562357"), text = element_text(color = "#80868b"), axis.text.x = element_blank()) grafico_colunas <- function(dados, col, y_label){ dados |> dplyr::rename(coluna = {{col}}) |> dplyr::count(coluna) |> dplyr::mutate( porc = scales::percent(n/sum(n)) , coluna = forcats::fct_reorder(coluna, n)) |> ggplot() + aes(y = coluna, x = n) + geom_col(fill = "#562457") + labs(x = "Porcentagem de respondentes", y = y_label) + geom_label(aes(x = n+7, y = coluna, label = porc)) + rladies_theme } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # censo_2020_url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ht53wO-qiWsrF3zLIn6DaENNLLjQGqleZL6E6g0lMTc/edit?resourcekey#gid=861397353" # # censo_2020_raw <- googlesheets4::read_sheet(censo_2020_url) |> # janitor::clean_names() # # # censo_2020 <- censo_2020_raw |> # dplyr::select( # de_acordo = 2, # genero = 4, # raca = 9, # filhos = 11, # deixou_ir_evento_filhos = 14, # lgbt = 20, # restricao_alimentar = 26, # onde_mora = 32 # ) |> # dplyr::filter(de_acordo == "Sim") |> # dplyr::mutate( # genero = dplyr::if_else(genero == "Feminino", "Mulher (cis ou trans)", genero) # ) # # readr::write_rds(censo_2020, file = "data/censo_2020.rds") #readr::write_rds(censo_2020_raw, file = "data/censo_2020_raw.rds") censo_2020 <- readr::read_rds("data/censo_2020.rds") censo_2020_raw <- readr::read_rds("data/censo_2020_raw.rds") ``` ::: -
